comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.8.1.20) Gecko/20081217 Firefox/2.0.0.20 (Nightly/Aurora)
Build ID: 2008121709

Steps to reproduce:

install tar xjf firefox-10.0.12esr.tar.bz2 after update in firefox2.0.0.20 in folder /opt with 'firefox.old/firefox'


Actual results:

crashreport in /opt/firefox without send or receive answer not ID= or other Report


Expected results:

not run as administrator ./firefox version Firefox-10.0.12esr after installing and copy the plugins from firefox.old/firefox also in folder directory /opt
comments.creator: rene.heyb@gmail.com
comments.author: rene.heyb@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 8351567
crashreporterfirefox-10.0.12esr.doc

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.8.1.20) Gecko/20081217 Firefox/2.0.0.20 (Nightly/Aurora)
Build ID: 2008121709

Steps to reproduce:

install tar xjf firefox-10.0.12esr.tar.bz2 after update in firefox2.0.0.20 in folder /opt with 'firefox.old/firefox'


Actual results:

crashreport in /opt/firefox without send or receive answer not ID= or other Report


Expected results:

not run as administrator ./firefox version Firefox-10.0.12esr after installing and copy the plugins from firefox.old/firefox also in folder directory /opt

La mise à jour entre firefox2.0.0.11 or firefox2.0.0.20 après mise à jour automatique suite à la mise à jour manuelle des plugins avec EeePC 701 4G  puis l'installation de firefox-10.0.12esr.tar.bz2 seule /opt/firefox.old/firefox RUN AS Administrator dans la version obsolète firefox2.0.0.20   et dans l'installation de /opt/firefox il n'y a pas crashreport possible ni ID ni envois, ni réponses satisfaisantsdans le fichier.
Je n'obtiens pas non plus d'envoi ou réponse pour le par aideReport A broken Web Site
comments.author: rene.heyb@gmail.com
comments.creator: rene.heyb@gmail.com

comments.text:
Created attachment 8351647
Firefox-10.0.12esr CrashReporter éditeur de texte.doc

Update and installing a version later run firefox2.0.0.20 give
Crashreporter.ini  without possibilities to send and receive crash
messages also errors on execution the messages; no ID= ;no answers
than "plantage" von firefox in the directory /opt/firefox   !
I can allways run firefox in directory /opt/firefox.old/firefox  with
right click on the file firefox for "Run as Administrator" to obtain
the web

comments.raw_text: I haven't opened the attachments because they are .doc and I'm afraid of viruses, but I don't see any inforamtion here that is security-sensitive. Also, this report is about Firefox 10 which is very old and now unsupported.
